sentences.en: After the big job was finished, the builder cut back the number of men looking for him.
sentences.cn: 那幢大建筑物完工后, 建筑师便裁减了许多人.

sentences.en: He got a job as a builder's labourer.
sentences.cn: 他找到了一份建筑工人的工作.

sentences.en: If you think that the repair is going to be a difficult job, we'll just have to call in a builder.
sentences.cn: 如果你认为这项修理工作很困难的话, 我们就得去请个建筑工人来了.

sentences.en: It is cheaper to have extra building work done when the builder is on site.
sentences.cn: 建筑工在现场干活时，让他额外做工的话工钱会便宜一些。

sentences.en: The builder costed the job at $ 1 , 000.
sentences.cn: 这活儿营造商估价为1000元.

sentences.en: The builder failed to fulfil the terms of his obligation.
sentences.cn: 营造商未能履行合同的条款.

sentences.en: The builder had a commitment to finish the work on time.
sentences.cn: 那个承建商答应过准时完工.

sentences.en: The builder heightened the doorway to accommodate the tall owner.
sentences.cn: 建筑者把门口加高以适应这个高个子房主的需要.

sentences.en: The builder looked at me as though I was barking mad.
sentences.cn: 那个建筑工人瞅着我，好像我哪不对劲儿似的。

sentences.en: The builder reckons 15 man - hours for the job.
sentences.cn: 建者估计这个活儿需要15个工时.

sentences.en: The builder wedges the wooden partition to the overhead construction.
sentences.cn: 建筑工人把木隔板?a在顶部的结构上.

sentences.en: The builders have finished the roof.
sentences.cn: 建筑工人们已经完成了屋顶的建造。

sentences.en: The house is never built for less than the builder counted on.
sentences.cn: 造房子的钱绝不会比造房子的人原先估计的少.

sentences.en: The job was costed by builder at about $ 1500.
sentences.cn: 这件活儿施工人员估计要1500美元.

sentences.en: This assumption will be justified by the work of the builder.
sentences.cn: 这个假定要由建筑师的工作来保证.

sentences.en: We asked our builder to estimate for the repair of the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 我们要求营造商估算一下修理天花板的费用.

trans.tran_en: a person or a company that builds or repairs buildings
